keyMoments.title: Defeat Pacifista PX-4
keyMoments.description: The crew combines their strongest attacks to defeat a Pacifista, but are left completely exhausted.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's growth and teamwork, but also exposes their vulnerability.

keyMoments.title: Crew Splits Into Three Groups
keyMoments.description: Faced with overwhelming odds, Luffy orders the crew to split into three groups to escape, marking the beginning of their tragic separation.
keyMoments.significance: First major separation of the crew since forming, foreshadowing the devastating events to come.
